price: They said, “O Noah, if you do not desist, you will certainly be stoned.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
